extension.summary: A cinematic screensaver that turns your library into a family-safe gallery.
extension.description: Experience your library like never before. This screensaver intelligently pulls artwork directly from your Kodi database to create a personalized slideshow of your favorite content. The standout feature is the Safety Filter system, designed specifically for families and shared living spaces. Instead of risking a "Rated R" or "TV-MA" image appearing during a family gathering, you can toggle specific content ratings on or off in the settings.
